Results.Description:
As a SC Property Manager, once notified  I need to create a new closeout record so the workflow can begin:

User enters the following information:
  1. Contract Number (copy and paste from email or type ahead)
  2. Contract Type (types are: CS, CSNF, CP, CPAF, CPIF, CPFF, FPI, FPIF, FFP, TM) multi-select
  3. Closure Notification Date (CCN email was sent from ICMS) today or before only
  4. Performance End Date (That's the date the contract is over)
  5. Closure Status (statuses are: In closure, Pre-closure, Closed, Open, cancelled
  6. Property Closure Administrator (assign from list)
  7. Property Closure Secondary Admin (assign from list)
  • all fields required
  • system capture entered by user ID and time stamp
  • after Enter clicked, system verify that contract # is a valid # in our DB, and unique #
    • if number is NOT unique, then a message displays allowing user choice of going to existing or starting a new closeout for a different contract
  • if contract # not found, system accepts user entered contract #, and flags "manual entry"

system creates new record and Detail page opens

  • system pulls workflow # (if can't, manual entry)
  • displays apex data, and alternate contract title
  • system displays contract code (from PCIS)
  • system displays type, from Apex
  • system displays planned closeout duration
  • DCMA check box (from ICMS)? if we get it, otherwise user selects it
  • user may edit status (from pre or in to closed, or canceled)
  • system displays perf end date
  • sys displays project def (multiple) (former GLA Network Activiti)
  • can all fields be edited?
  • when clicking save, system will go out and analyze data to display property type (and count ??)
Results.Name: [Continued] [Continued] create new contract closeout record

Results.Description:
as a contract closeout admin or Manager I need to assign all property zero certifiers to a CC so they will be aware of their future required actions

  • user selects ZC names based on ZC roles list, and type of material found

  • selections may be edited by CC admin and the assigned ZC
  • system provides save button and send button
  • send button sends notice of new contract closure created to assigned people
  • do we need to have secondary ZCs? Yes
  • ZC roles are per property type (CAM Primary, etc)


 Notes: no workflow required for ZC,  ZC does nothing at this point
Results.Name: [Continued] [Continued] Select Property Zero Certifiers

Results.Description:
as a SC Property Manager I need to see a list of all received CCN's  so I know what I need to enter into the system

try to  integrate with ICMS so that instead of emails going to group mail box, notice is sent directly to new system, or can IT system read emails from ICMS?
Results.Name: view received ICMS notifications

Results.Description:
as the assigned zero certifier PoC I need to be notified when I have material to work so I can begin

  • new actions show up on user's action to do list and in an email
  • recipient may delegate to another person 
  • recipient's manager may also reassign
  • notification to include:
    • contract number
    • contract code
    • closure date
    • number of items on list ??
    • for GFM only, include instructions to update Prism to 'in closure'
  • future release:
    • <notification type is based on entered user preference>
    • <user may select to receive notice even if system finds no inventory>

Developer Notes:

The system may need to handle scenarios where data in the source system does not reflect a workflow action.  For example, a PRISM inventory count is incorrect in our app but has been fixed in the source system. Our app would have to wait a day to get the correct count. 

Also, should the system enforce validation checks on workflow tasks? For instance, inventory is still assigned to a user but they have an option of progressing to the next step in the workflow.

TASKS:

  • notification handling
  • workflow actions
  • determine which inventory  needs to be researched --> done in previous story

QUESTIONS:

  • Is this the desired functionality?: admin user indicates that a notification needs to be sent to an assigned person (notification request), daily these notification requests are aggregated and sent to the appropriate people

Results.Description:
as a SC Property Manager I need to assign all property zero certifiers to a CC so they will be aware of their required actions

  • system automatically selects names based on ZC roles list, and type of material found
  • selections may be edited by CC admin and the assigned ZC person

We will need to determine the business logic for auto-assigning responsibilities.

need to create program/responsible person table and populate
Results.Name: [Unfinished] Select Property Zero Certifiers people

Results.Description:
add "IDIQ DO" with yes/no selection

check for existence of PCIS code

if IDIQ = yes and code exists, complete zero certs and follow full workflow

if IDIQ = yes and no code exists, skip zero certs then continue workflow at that point

if IDIQ = no and code exists, skip zero cert steps then continue workflow at that point

if IDIQ = no and no code exists, skip zero cert steps then continue workflow at that point
Results.Name: IDIQ differences

Results.Name: [Unfinished] ZC PoC receive new action notice

Results.Description:
1. as a CC Admin I need to assign a Program Manager to a CC so they can start their required actions

  • CC admin enters desired name
  • system finds person in Directory Services then assigns selected person to role of PM for that contract
  • systems sends email to assigned PM

2. PM may reassign role to another PM same as above process. Original PM no longer responsible.

3. PM may delegate responsibility to a PM PoC using same as above process.  system retains both names in PM role for that contract  ? can more than 1 PoC be assigned ?
Results.Name: Assign Program Manager; delegate & reassign
